name: Proto Drop
description:
NOTICE: For best experience please download the game (The browser game will be rarely updated). If you do decide to play it on your browser please make sure it is full screen or it won't work properly.

HOW TO INSTALL: Just incase you didn't know how to install it heres how, First download the game, next extract the folder inside to your desktop (or any other location). Then all you have to do is run the exe inside the folder (dont delete any of the files it will corrupt the game)

INSTRUCTIONS: This is a dropper game. Shift to boost. Orange squares kill you. Blue Squares boost you. Red squares slow you down. Grey squares do nothing (its a glitch where the blue and red squares spawn together).

ROADMAP: I will soon be adding gold squares that give you a ton of points and cosmetic items like hats and skins. Some cosmetic items will give you advantages like extra speed and agility. I will also be making edits to the textures in the game.

If you find any bugs or glitches in the game please report them in the discussion board. Also, tell me how you thought the game was and anything i should add to it.

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:
